ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando vs Chain breaking root
ygData.msgSnippet: When in Unrest I was ghoul rooted, I kicked chain up, was able to move BUT the root icon was there, when the chain icon faded i tired to kick selo s up, but no
ygData.messageBody:
When in Unrest I was ghoul rooted, I kicked chain up, was able to move BUT
the root icon was there, when the chain icon faded i tired to kick selo's up,
but no go. I was moving at regular walk speed with chain on, and then reg run
speed when it quit. This still is not the best thing, I would have surely
died had not the train stopped at a group i passed.
I do not like not being able to break root, everyone (non bard) i have talked
to doesnt like it either. Pre-patch I could go into unrest and within 5
minutes have a group, invariably I would have to run in to selo the puller,
or if i was pulling use it to get free. Last night I went in and after
shoutin that i was seeking a group, 2 groups /tell me wondering if I can
break root yet, I say no, they both said something to the effect of "Oh,
well, we'll get this other guy then". Aw well, didnt like unrest anyways...

Renaldo
